description.ko: 심연의 중력이 거대한 빛의 구조물을 만들어내는 우주의 고요한 위엄에 대한 헌사입니다.
description.en: A tribute to the silent majesty of the universe, where the gravity of the abyss crafts monumental structures of light.

prompt: An impossible cathedral formed by the gravitational lens of a supermassive black hole, its pillars made of compressed starlight and swirling indigo dark matter filaments. Cosmic scale with event horizon physics affecting the light of nearby pulsars. 8k, hyper-realistic, volumetric gas simulations. Detailed textures of stardust and celestial debris. Dramatic lighting from the radiant core, creating a sense of cosmic horror majesty and infinite depth. Raytraced light scattering through the nebulous gas.
